TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlWriterTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将跟踪或调试输出作为 XML 编码的数据定向到 或 （如 ）。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output as XML-encoded data to a or to a , such as a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 必须具有非托管代码权限来创建的实例类。You must have unmanaged code permission to create an instance of the class. 类将跟踪和调试信息的 XML 编码的文本流。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 将 XML 输出的说明所示各表所述。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables that follow. 可以使用[Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)来显示 XML 输出。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the XML output. 可以启用或禁用通过应用程序配置文件，然后使用已配置的在应用程序中。You can enable or disable an through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 另外，可以创建在代码中。Alternately, you can create an in your code. 若要配置，编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To configure an , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加或删除侦听器、 为侦听器设置的属性或删除侦听器。In this file, you can add or remove a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove listeners. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 类继承属性从基类。The class inherits the property from the base class . 属性允许另一级别的跟踪输出在侦听器的筛选。The property allows an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果存在，筛选器`Trace`方法的跟踪侦听器调用筛选器以确定是否发出跟踪的方法。If there is a filter present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试写入到正在使用中的文件或不可用，文件名称自动作为前缀的 guid。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器方法旨在由方法调用， ，和类。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 侦听器方法不应直接从应用程序代码调用。The listener methods are not intended to be called directly from application code. 侦听器主要是以供类。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 和可以调用方法并类和默认值提供的 XML 元素的和不提供的值。The and methods can be called by the and classes, and default values are provided for the XML elements that and do not supply values for. 下表介绍的元素和属性的 XML 输出。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|特性Attributes|输出Output|说明Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|无None|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字符如 > 或 < 使用转义序列替换。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 请参阅后面的转义的字符转换表。See the escaped character translation table that follows.| |`Computer`|无None|始终存在。Always present.| 属性的值。The value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|始终存在Always present|如果未指定，默认值为一个空的 GUID。If not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取决于是否存在`relatedActivityId`跟踪方法调用中的参数。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the Trace method call.| 方法的 `relatedActivityId` 参数。The `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`DataItem`|无None|取决于`data`参数的方法。Depends on the `data` parameter of the method.|此元素可包含的元素或一个元素的数组，因此值编写为一系列`DataItem`节点下的`TraceData`元素。This element can contain an array of elements or one element, so the values are written as a set of `DataItem` nodes under the `TraceData` element.

数据输出使用`ToString`传入的数据对象的方法。The data output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`EventID`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入 (`id`)。Parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessName`|始终存在。Always present.|从。From the .| ||`ProcessID`|始终存在。Always present.|从。From the . 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 操作系统上，如果`ProcessID`大于的 2,147,483,647 它是负数的正值表示形式并应将转换为获取正确的进程标识符。On Windows 98 and Windows Me operating systems, if `ProcessID` is greater than 2,147,483,647 it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|始终存在。Always present.|从。From the .| |`Level`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入 (的数值`eventType`)。Parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 参数值大于 255 的输出形式 255。Parameter values greater than 255 are output as 255.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|无None|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|不可以有多个逻辑操作，因此值编写为`LogicalOperation`节点下的`LogicalOperationStack`元素。There can be more than one logical operation, so the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`Message`|无None|取决于存在跟踪方法调用中的消息。Depends on the presence of a message in the Trace method call.|如果未提供格式设置参数，则此元素是将格式化的消息。This element is a formatted message if formatting arguments are provided.| |`Source`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|输入的参数。Parameter input.| |`SubType`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|输入的参数。Parameter input.| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|始终存在。Always present.|如果不存在于，默认值为当前的时间。If not present in the , the default is the current time.| |`TimeStamp`|无None|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|从。From the .| |`Type`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|值始终为 3。Always the value 3.| 下表显示 XML 输出中转义的字符。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 转义发生在所有元素和特性除外`DataItem`元素，如果该对象传递给不进行转义`data`的参数方法是对象。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes with the exception of the `DataItem` element, which is not escaped if the object passed to the `data` parameter of the method is an object. 如果用于数据对象，调用方法和作为非转义的数据跟踪整个根节点。If an is used for the data object, the method is called and the entire root node is traced as unescaped data. |转义字符Escaped character|“值”Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类将转义和非转义的数据写入文件日志。The following code example shows the use of the class to write both escaped and non-escaped data to file logs. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/VB/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化的新实例类，指定路径上指定的文件使用编码。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果该文件存在，则将它追加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果该文件不存在，被创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少可能出现异常，可能导致无效输出所有字符均都替换"？"字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 属性初始化为空字符串 ("")。The property is initialized to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性设置为`name`参数值或为空字符串 ("") 如果`name`参数是`null`。This constructor initializes the property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 名称可以用作到索引要以编程方式更改侦听器的属性集合。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码设置的实例属性其属性是"xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认行为是在消息框中显示消息和详细的消息，应用程序在用户界面模式中，并对其运行时实例中集合。The default behavior is to display the message and detailed message in a message box when the application is running in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. 默认情况下，该集合包含的一个实例。By default, the collection contains an instance of . 可以通过添加或删除自定义此行为集合中。You can customize this behavior by adding or removing a from the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, data As Object)

override this.TraceData : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * obj -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A data object to emit.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数转换为无符号整数之前编写，因此为负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`形式写入参数`DataItem`中的节点`TraceData`元素。The `data` parameter is written as a `DataItem` node in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由方法调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数转换为无符号整数之前编写，因此为负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 中的对象`data`方式编写参数数组`DataItem`中的节点`TraceData`元素。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `DataItem` nodes in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`的每个数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由方法调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数转换为无符号整数之前编写，因此为负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`形式写入参数`Message`元素。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由方法调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息（包括相关活动的标识）、消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是否用于关联相关的跟踪。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. `eventCache`， `source`， `id`，和`relatedActivityId`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数转换为无符号整数之前编写，因此为负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`形式写入参数`Message`元素。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. 调用方法来转换`relatedActivityId`"B"的值格式的字符串，它显示在标头。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId`value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. `SubTypeName`页脚中的元素标识跟踪事件的类型为。The `SubTypeName` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它旨在通过调用发出的跟踪信息的对象及其方法。It is intended to be called by a object to emit the trace information for its method.
